Name: Target processing in overt serial visual search involves the dorsal attention network: A fixation-based event-related fMRI study.
ReferencesAndLinks: If you reference this dataset in your publications, please aknowledge its authors and cite: Ischebeck A, Hiebel H, Miller J, Höfler M, Gilchrist ID, Körner C (in press) Target processing in overt serial visual search involves the dorsal attention network: A fixation-based event-related fMRI study. Neuropsychologia.
